content.user_title: Build type-safe CMS applications with Payload CMS guidance
content.value_statement: Payload CMS development can be complex with collections, hooks, and access control. This skill provides instant access to patterns and solutions for common Payload development challenges.
actual_capabilities: Explains Payload CMS collection and field configuration patterns
Provides access control implementation examples with RBAC and row-level security
Documents hook patterns for data transformation and validation
Shows query syntax for Local API, REST, and GraphQL
Guides plugin development with package structure and best practices
Covers database adapter setup for MongoDB, Postgres, and SQLite
limitations: Does not execute code or connect to databases
Cannot modify your Payload configuration files directly
Documentation focused on patterns, not project-specific debugging

output_examples.input: How do I implement role-based access control in Payload?
output: Add a roles field to your Users collection with saveToJWT: true
Create reusable access functions like adminOnly and adminOrEditor
Apply access functions to collection operations: create, read, update, delete
Use field-level access to hide sensitive fields from non-admin users
Set overrideAccess: false when using Local API with a user parameter

best_practices: Always pass the req parameter in hooks for transaction safety
Set overrideAccess: false when using Local API with user context
Use context flags to prevent infinite hook loops
anti_patterns: Do not assume Local API respects access control by default
Avoid nested operations in hooks without passing req parameter
Do not create hooks that update the same collection without loop prevention

faq.question: Which Payload CMS versions does this skill support?
faq.answer: This skill covers Payload CMS 3.x patterns and APIs. Some patterns may differ in earlier versions.

faq.question: What are the field type limits for relationships?
faq.answer: Relationships can be single or hasMany. Set maxDepth to control population depth and prevent circular reference issues.

faq.question: Can I use this skill with existing Payload projects?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill provides patterns and examples that work with any Payload 3.x project structure.

faq.question: Does this skill access my project files or database?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides documentation only. It does not read, write, or connect to any external systems.

faq.question: Why is my access control not working in Local API?
faq.answer: Local API bypasses access control by default. Set overrideAccess: false when passing a user parameter.

faq.question: How does this compare to the official Payload docs?
faq.answer: This skill distills patterns from official docs into quick-reference format optimized for AI assistant context.
